scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MODE=dev CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true nodemon index.js
scripts.local:socket: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MODE=local CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true PM2_HOME='/root/.pm2' pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.physic:socket: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MODE=physic CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true PM2_HOME='/root/.pm2' pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.prod:socket: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MODE=prod CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true PM2_HOME='/root/.pm2' pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
